description: This Java source file defines a REST controller class `ApiController` that provides several HTTP GET endpoints for a backend service. It includes endpoints for root welcome message, health status, and information about the backend services, matching specific frontend expected calls.

classes.name: ApiController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing endpoints for a web backend, including a welcome message, health status, and info details.

methods.name: rootWelcome
methods.description: Handles GET requests at root path '/', returns a welcome string message.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/health', returns a JSON object with service status and current timestamp.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/api/info', returns a JSON object with service name, version, description, and timestamp.
